question:
####UFAQ [Michael Boggs]
If Tithonium is already hosting a [Pawn](/en/card/04002) when it is rezzed, what happens to the Pawn?
answer:
The Pawn is immediately and unpreventably trashed because Tithonium cannot host it.

Can the Corp use [Oversight AI](/en/card/02079) to rez Tithonium? If so, does the Corp still install Oversight AI onto Tithonium?
